name: MLDecisionTreeClassifier.ModelParameters
desc: Parameters that affect the process of training a model.

items.name: init(validationData: MLDataTable?, maxDepth: Int, minLossReduction: Double, minChildWeight: Double, randomSeed: Int)
items.desc: Creates a new set of parameters.

items.name: var validationData: MLDataTable?
items.desc: The data used for the validation set to inform the model training process.

items.name: var maxDepth: Int
items.desc: The maximum depth of the tree. Must be greater than 0.

items.name: var minLossReduction: Double
items.desc: The minimum amount that the loss needs to be reduced to create a new split.

items.name: var minChildWeight: Double
items.desc: The minimum weight of each leaf node.

items.name: var randomSeed: Int
items.desc: The seed value for random operations during tree building process.

items.name: var description: String
items.desc: A text representation of the model parameters for a decision tree classifier.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A text representation of the model parameters for a decision tree classifier thatâ€™s suitable for output during debugging.

items.name: var playgroundDescription: Any
items.desc: A description of the model parameters for a decision tree classifier shown in a playground.

items.name: init(validation: MLDecisionTreeClassifier.ModelParameters.ValidationData, maxDepth: Int, minLossReduction: Double, minChildWeight: Double, randomSeed: Int)
